name: Trolmoyer
description:
The magical island of Trolmoyer that sits in the middle of the Norwegian sea has remained secluded since ancient times.

You play as one of four champions against up to 3 of your rivals. You could choose the brutish barbarian, Valderheim. The animalistic celt, Carmen. The nefarious scientist, Songbird. Or the jester with a fiery performance, Wiosna. Each character with up to 4 unique skins to choose from. 

Choose your battleground from one of the 4 maps, each with unique gameplay elements and designs. From the serene Carmen's Camp to the blazing Demon Theatre. Each character has made their mark on Trolmoyer's landscape in one way or another. 

So enjoy this top-down PvP brawler. This is a second year university project developed over 8 months by a passionate team of 6.

How to Play - 

Left Stick - Movement

Left Trigger (Hold) - Lock on

Right Stick - Cycle Lock on targets

A - Dash Ability

X - Quick Attack

Y - Strong Attack

B - Special Attack
